enchance: This API retrieves detailed information about the facilities and services offered by a specific hotel during the selected stay period, such as air conditioning, non-smoking rooms, internet access, and room service. It indicates whether each facility is free, available during the stay. Results can be displayed in different languages for better accessibility. This helps users evaluate whether a hotel meets their personal preferences before making a booking decision.

api.name: Get_Hotel_Facilities
api.func_description: Retrieves a list of facilities and services (e.g., pool, gym, Wi-Fi) offered by a specified hotel, with optional filtering by date and language.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

required.query: I'm considering staying at a hotel with ID 5955189. Can you tell me what facilities they offer, like if they have a pool or gym?

optional.query: I'm planning to stay at a hotel with ID 5955189. Could you provide me with a list of all the facilities and services they offer, such as a swimming pool, gym, or Wi-Fi? Also, if possible, I'd like the information to be in English.

instances.title: Process in place to check health of guests
Hand sanitizer in guest accommodation and key areas
Shared stationery such as printed menus, magazines, pens, and paper removed
Staff follow all safety protocols as directed by local authorities
Screens or physical barriers placed between staff and guests in appropriate areas
Linens, towels and laundry washed in accordance with local authority guidelines
Use of cleaning chemicals that are effective against Coronavirus
All plates, cutlery, glasses and other tableware have been sanitized
Food can be delivered to guest accommodation

facilityGroups.title: Internet
facilityGroups.summary: WiFi is available in the rooms and is free of charge.

facilityGroups.title: Parking
facilityGroups.summary: Free public parking is possible at a location nearby (reservation is not needed).
